result.execSummary:
The defendant Steven P Guidry Jr was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Steven P Guidry Jr is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Steven P Guidry Jr was found guilty of OWI (1st w/ Passenger < 16 Yrs Old), an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 346.63(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
10:03 a.m.  Defendant present in court with Atty Barb Privat.  Andrew Christenson for the State of Wisconsin.  Court recites agreement - defendant will plea to count 1 and counts 2 & 3 will be dismissed.  State concurs.  Atty Privat concurs.  Defendant concurs.

Court goes over plea questionnaire with the defendant.  Court goes over constitutional rights with the defendant - defendant waives these rights.  Court goes over the elements of each offense.  Court instructs defendant of the maximum penalty.  Court instructs defendant regarding deportation.

Defendant enters a plea of GUILTY.  Court finds the plea is made freely, voluntarily, intelligently and understandingly.  Court finds there is a factual basis to support the plea.  Court finds the defendant guilty on count 1.  Court orders counts 2 & 3 be dismissed outright.  Court orders the judgment of conviction be entered here today.  Sentencing statement by DA.  Statement by Atty Privat.  No statement by the defendant.

Court sentences the defendant to:

-10 days county jail, with huber and to commence within 60 days.  Court has no objection to out of county service.
-$350 fine plus court costs - Court grants the defendant 60 days to pay or payment plan.
-Blood Draw Fee - $42.50
-DL revocation - 12 months
-AODA Assessment
-Defendant is to submit a DNA Sample.

Court adjourned at 10:10 a.m.
Status hearing at 12-21-2015 09:30 am

10:16 a.m.  No appearance by the defendant.  Attorney Barb Privat present.  Andrew Christenson for the State of Wisconsin.  Statement by Atty Privat - has contact with the defendant, could not make court today.  Court sets for Mandatory appearance on December 21, 2015 at 9:30 a.m.

Court adjourned at 10:16 a.m.

11:42 a.m.  No appearance by the defendant.  Attorney Barb Privat present.  Andrew Christenson for the State of Wisconsin.  Statement by Atty Privat - waiting on Discovery.  Court will set for Status Hearing on November 16, 2015 at 9:30 a.m.

Court adjourned at 11:42 a.m.
Defendant's

By Atty Barb Privat
Status hearing at 09-22-2015 11:00 am

9:28 a.m.  No appearance by the defendant.  Attorney Barb Privat present.  Andrew Christenson for the State of Wisconsin.  Statement by Atty Privat - needs time to talk with the DA.  Court will set for Status Hearing on September 22, 2015 at 11:00 a.m.

Court adjourned at 9:29 a.m.

ADDRESS INFO for Steven P Guidry Jr
Current: 119 Zifful Ct, Houma, LA 70364 United States  (Effective: 08-03-2015)
Prior: 912 Academy St, Elroy, WI 53929
Status hearing at 08-25-2015 09:15 am

1:14 p.m.  Defendant present in court without counsel.  Andrew Christenson for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant confirms receipt of the criminal complaint and waives reading.  Court instructs the defendant of the maximum penalty on each count.  Court finds probable cause.  Court instructs the defendant of his right to an attorney.  Defendant enters a plea of GUILTY.  DA recites agreement, defendant will plea to count 1 with a fine and costs and count 2 will be dismissed.  Defendant requests to plead GUILTY.  Court goes over right to counsel.  Court determines the defendant stands mute and enters a plea of NOT GUILTY on behalf of the defendant.  DA makes bond recommendation.  Court sets bond at $500.00 signature bond.  Court will set for Status Hearing on August 25, 2015 at 9:15 a.m.

Court adjourned at 1:22 p.m.
